page.title: 15Cricket in Arundel
page.content: The{Arundel cricket club}is one of the oldest in the world. It is situated on a 5 acre site off the A27 to the West of the town. It is still very active, many matches being played by both senior and junior teams during the season. In the winter the club house is used for social activities; parties, folk club, wedding receptions etc. Unfortunately, recent vandalism has necessitated the installation of shutters and security light. Arundel is famous in the world of cricket, as traditionally the first match of each international Test cricket team visiting England is played against the{Duchess of {Norfolk's Eleven.}This match is played in the castle grounds and attracts large crowds.
